plot: Desecration of a sacred bath disrupts the sex life of a 1930s Jewish village in Ukraine (then part of Czechoslovakia). Directed by Zeno Dostal, this gently humorous film stars Ondrej Vetchy...
title: Golet v údolí
plot_es: Desecration of a sacred bath disrupts the sex life of a 1930s Jewish village in Ukraine (then part of Czechoslovakia). Directed by Zeno Dostal, this gently humorous film stars Ondrej Vetchy...
